content.text:
# Howard West

Howard West (September 24, 1931 â€“ December 3, 2015) was an American talent agent and television producer best known for his work with long-term partner George Shapiro in producing and managing Jerry Seinfeld.
West and Shapiro, who were childhood friends in the Bronx, were partners in the company Shapiro/West and Associates.
He died of a stroke in Los Angeles, aged 84.
